name: 5 Vista Adventure Game
description:
Dive Into 5 Vista 2018 Class !

This Is a Tower Defense game and stop them from obtaining a rotten tupperware

Bosses: Hadib , Ummi , Akmal , Ain , Fhatihah , Jerol , Khalis

Narrator: Hadib, Cekodok , Hannah , Ijan , Hani , Aspa , Hisyam 

My classmates try to obtain the rotten tupperware because there was a rumor that if they get the tupperware , they would get 9a+ for spm, but actually if they get it my classmate will die. Stop Them from dieing !

Powers: Hadib:No power ; its a tutorial
Ummi: Buffed Enemy from her puffy cheecks
Akmal: Hacked The system and Disable your vision
Ain: Shoots Love that petrifies turret
Fhatihah: Heals her troops with her laughter
Jerol: Ball troop that shoots exploding balls - Destroy turret
Khalis: Trophy troop that couldnt be targeted unless the turret is upgraded
